longFunction.description: Functions exceeding 50 lines should be refactored into smaller, focused functions

largeFile.description: Files exceeding 500 lines are harder to maintain and should be split

todoDensity.description: High TODO/FIXME density indicates incomplete work or technical debt

complexity.description: Functions with high cyclomatic complexity are hard to test and maintain

duplicateCode.description: Duplicate code blocks should be extracted into reusable functions

unusedImports.description: Unused imports add noise and should be removed

consoleLogs.description: Console.log statements should be replaced with proper logging
